org.apache.tamaya.core.propertysource

Class SimplePropertySource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.core.propertysource.BasePropertySource
      • org.apache.tamaya.core.propertysource.SimplePropertySource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertySource

    public class SimplePropertySource
extends BasePropertySource
    Simple implementation of a PropertySource for simple property files and XML property files.
